resources.string: Unknown error while setting app enabled/disabled setting.
Error gaining root. Please allow root permissions to App Disabler when asked.
Root was not detected on your device. App Disabler requires root to run.
Root was not detected on your device. App Disabler requires root to work.
App Disabler can alter the functionality of your device, possibly for the worse. By using App Disabler you agree that I (nebkat) am not responsible for any damages caused to your device.
